> <OLD - Nightlight>

> Nightlight looked at Rodimus and said "I'm talikg about your true self,
> after the attack of the insectives beings, you were captured for them and
> Tucson and the others rescued you too and taken to the Ark... You woke up
> before me, and battle defending the Ark from hydras, I woke up later without
> a beast form... we meet briefly and I started the process to take this beast
> form.. while i was in the Cr you left the base in a mission and dissapeared,
> then your Dark personalitie appeared again... you mentioned that your were
> as if you was on fire? Your frame color were Golden, red and oragne and this
> "said the femme while she touched glenty his chest" looked like real

>
> "Why are you so agitate when I mention it?"she said while she looked
> carefully at his eyes as if she liked to ponder if he was lying her
>
> Nightlight didnt liked to admit it but all her unfortunate adventure was
> starting to take the toll but she couldnt down the guard. She wanted the
> true.

<NEW>

"No!" DARK RODIMUS said as he pushed away from NIGHTLIGHT and began
pacing around the room, his movements predatory, aggressive  and
angry, his optics blazing, "No! I am the only real Rodimus, there is
no other besides me. I can remember having different colors and when I
was a Maximal." He paused for a moment, not yet looking at NIGHTLIGHT.

"I am no longer a Maximal I am something more." he said quietly. "I am
evolving past that. Tuscon and his petty squabbles, wanting to be
leader, he can have it!"

Now he finally did look at NIGHTLIGHT, "One of the last things I
remember of him is when he said he would take charge of the Maximals,
well they are his now." He smiled, "And you are mine and so will
Elita! The rest of that light can go to the pit!"

His smile became even more wicked, "As for what you thought of this
other Rodimus." DARK RODIMUS waved a dissmissive hand in the air,
"Well he is gone now and there is only me now, and I make my own
path!"

(TAG)

Preston
